name: Lucid Demo (TinyBookshelf)
description: This was a little proof-of-concept project I worked on in the month following Octobug's release. For now I will just say that it may have at one time been intended to be part of a larger thing, but I think I will just leave it as-is, this short odd playthrough, a valuable bit of experience for me as a beginner-developer to put together and try a few new things.
